name: Dojah Inc
headline: Prevent Fraud and Onboard Users Faster
description: Dojah is an end-to-end AI Powered Fraud Prevention and KYC Platform. From onboarding to ongoing monitoring, we are helping businesses fight financial crime and onboard customers faster.

founders.name: Tobi Ololade, Founder
founders.description: Tobi Ololade is the Founder and CEO of Dojah. Tobi plays a leading role in driving key strategic initiatives across the global business. Previously he was the CTO of Tradebua, a data and API infrastructure for agriculture finance. Tobi became an entrepreneur in his early days as a student, running a business that served clients in multiple countries.

founders.name: Ayomide Oso, Founder
founders.description:
Ayomide is the co-founder and Head of product. Ayomide's tech journey started at Elta Solutions, a dev shop providing a range of services for building digital products. This gave her a good understanding of major problems innovators across the continent face.
Ayomide worked on several products, including Ropay (https://ropay.ng/). While at this, she faced similar problem innovators across sectors are dealing with in "sourcing API's and necessary data" and decided to solve it once and for all.

## A fully integrated suite of products for fraud detection and prevention
Stop Fraud Before it Starts. Simplify Your Workflows. Streamline Customer Due Diligence, Prevent Fraud, and Manage Risk Effectively:
# Pre-set  Event-based fraud prevention system you can trust
Leverage a rule-based and event-based approach to fraud prevention using custom data to analyze individual events or transactions to stop fraud in real time.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2730%27%20height=%2731%27/%3e)![lockIcon](https://www.dojah.io)
AML Compliance
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2730%27%20height=%2731%27/%3e)![lockIcon](https://www.dojah.io)
Transaction Monitoring
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2730%27%20height=%2731%27/%3e)![lockIcon](https://www.dojah.io)
Reconciliation
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2730%27%20height=%2731%27/%3e)![lockIcon](https://www.dojah.io)
Credit Check
[Explore Anti-Fraud Hub![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2720%27%20height=%2720%27/%3e)![](https://www.dojah.io)](https://www.dojah.io/</fraud-management>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27647%27%20height=%27598%27/%3e)![anti-fraud](https://www.dojah.io)

# One-size-fits-all Customizable identity verification solution for all business sizes
Ditch rigid KYC tools for our ID infrastructure to create personalized verification flows tailored to your use case, journey, market or regulator requirement.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2730%27%20height=%2731%27/%3e)![lockIcon](https://www.dojah.io)
KYC-KYB
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2730%27%20height=%2731%27/%3e)![lockIcon](https://www.dojah.io)
Doc Analysis
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2730%27%20height=%2731%27/%3e)![lockIcon](https://www.dojah.io)
Biometric Verification
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2730%27%20height=%2731%27/%3e)![lockIcon](https://www.dojah.io)

[Explore Identity Hub![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2720%27%20height=%2720%27/%3e)![](https://www.dojah.io)](https://www.dojah.io/</identity-hub>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27101%27%20height=%2791%27/%3e)![fraud-mitigation](https://www.dojah.io)
# For Fraud Mitigation
Our transaction monitoring system analyzes user data to spot any suspicious behavior. This helps us find and stop any possible security risks before they happen; safeguarding your business.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2797%27%20height=%2788%27/%3e)![compliance](https://www.dojah.io)
# For Compliance
With our easy-to-use and detailed dashboard, comprehensive audit trails and reporting functionalities help demonstrate compliance during audits. This transparency builds trust with regulators and avoids potential roadblocks to growth.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2788%27%20height=%2788%27/%3e)![growth](https://www.dojah.io)
# For Growth
Our scalable verification solutions ensure a smooth user onboarding experience, no matter where your customers are. This removes a critical barrier to entry, letting you expand your market reach and accelerate global growth with ease.
With Dojah
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2710%27%20height=%2710%27/%3e)![arrow right](https://www.dojah.io)
# Trust, in numbers: track, measure, optimize decisions.
Your dashboard is built to give complete flexibility and a full picture of user identity and behaviour at any point of their journey, so you can make changes that work.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2730%27%20height=%2730%27/%3e)![lock icon](https://www.dojah.io)
Easy-to-review cases
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2730%27%20height=%2730%27/%3e)![lock icon](https://www.dojah.io)
Customisable dashboard 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2730%27%20height=%2730%27/%3e)![lock icon](https://www.dojah.io)
Role-based access and permission control 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2730%27%20height=%2730%27/%3e)![lock icon](https://www.dojah.io)
Analytics and insights 
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27669%27%20height=%27747%27/%3e)![reports](https://www.dojah.io)
# How businesses use Dojah
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2724%27%20height=%2724%27/%3e)![arrow-left](https://www.dojah.io)![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2724%27%20height=%2724%27/%3e)![arrow-right](https://www.dojah.io)

# Built for growth and compliance - Getting Started
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2743%27%20height=%2742%27/%3e)![out icon](https://www.dojah.io)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2780%27%20height=%2780%27/%3e)![get started](https://www.dojah.io)
### Effortless API Integrations
Seamlessly integrate Dojah's platform with your codebase and existing systems using our API first infrastructure.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2743%27%20height=%2742%27/%3e)![out icon](https://www.dojah.io)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2780%27%20height=%2780%27/%3e)![get started](https://www.dojah.io)
### Pre-Built for Speed 
Get started quickly with pre-built ID verification widgets and mobile SDKs (iOS, Android) with native plugins.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2743%27%20height=%2742%27/%3e)![out icon](https://www.dojah.io)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2780%27%20height=%2780%27/%3e)![get started](https://www.dojah.io)
### No-Code Customization 
Skip the coding entirely! Our user-friendly dashboard allows you to customize and deploy interfaces directly.
# Individually-crafted solutions for specific needs
Need a tailored solution? Partner with Dojah to design, integrate, and deploy a custom solution that perfectly meets your unique business needs.
[Learn more![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2720%27%20height=%2720%27/%3e)![](https://www.dojah.io)](https://www.dojah.io/</partners>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27302%27%20height=%27259%27/%3e)![craft](https://www.dojah.io)
# Certifications
Dojah is fully compliant with data protection regulations, including NDPR, SOC, etc. ensuring that all user data is handled securely and ethically. Our certifications underscore our commitment to maintaining the highest standards of data privacy. Partner with confidence, knowing your data is in safe hands
![NDPR compliance](https://www.dojah.io)
![ISO certification](https://www.dojah.io)
![SOC certification](https://www.dojah.io)
# Got any questions, we have got your answers
[Explore FAQs![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2720%27%20height=%2720%27/%3e)![](https://www.dojah.io)](https://www.dojah.io/<https:/calendly.com/dojah/dojah-sales>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27350%27%20height=%27350%27/%3e)![faq](https://www.dojah.io)
# Ready to beat fraud and build trust?
We’re on standby to help you set up a custom fraud prevention infrastructure; ensuring your platform is safe from financial and reputation losses.
[Talk to us![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2720%27%20height=%2720%27/%3e)![](https://www.dojah.io)](https://www.dojah.io/<https:/calendly.com/dojah/dojah-sales>)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%27530%27%20height=%27268%27/%3e)![build trust](https://www.dojah.io)
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2751%27%20height=%2724%27/%3e)![dojah logo](https://www.dojah.io)
Dojah is focused on enabling confidence and credibility across digital businesses. Our suite of API and no-code tools make it easy to securely access the identities of customers.

## A fully integrated suite of products for fraud detection and prevention
Stop Fraud Before it Starts. Simplify Your Workflows. Streamline Customer Due Diligence, Prevent Fraud, and Manage Risk Effectively:
# Pre-set  Event-based fraud prevention system you can trust
Leverage a rule-based and event-based approach to fraud prevention using custom data to analyze individual events or transactions to stop fraud in real time.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2730%27%20height=%2731%27/%3e)![lockIcon⟨1⟩]

# For Fraud Mitigation
Our transaction monitoring system analyzes user data to spot any suspicious behavior. This helps us find and stop any possible security risks before they happen; safeguarding your business.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2797%27%20height=%2788%27/%3e)![compliance⟨1⟩]
# For Compliance
With our easy-to-use and detailed dashboard, comprehensive audit trails and reporting functionalities help demonstrate compliance during audits. This transparency builds trust with regulators and avoids potential roadblocks to growth.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2788%27%20height=%2788%27/%3e)![growth⟨1⟩]
# For Growth
Our scalable verification solutions ensure a smooth user onboarding experience, no matter where your customers are. This removes a critical barrier to entry, letting you expand your market reach and accelerate global growth with ease.

# Built for growth and compliance - Getting Started
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2743%27%20height=%2742%27/%3e)![out icon⟨1⟩]

### Effortless API Integrations
Seamlessly integrate Dojah's platform with your codebase and existing systems using our API first infrastructure.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2743%27%20height=%2742%27/%3e)![out icon⟨1⟩]

### Pre-Built for Speed 
Get started quickly with pre-built ID verification widgets and mobile SDKs (iOS, Android) with native plugins.
![](data:image/svg+xml,%3csvg%20xmlns=%27http://www.w3.org/2000/svg%27%20version=%271.1%27%20width=%2743%27%20height=%2742%27/%3e)![out icon⟨1⟩]

### No-Code Customization 
Skip the coding entirely! Our user-friendly dashboard allows you to customize and deploy interfaces directly.
# Individually-crafted solutions for specific needs
Need a tailored solution? Partner with Dojah to design, integrate, and deploy a custom solution that perfectly meets your unique business needs.
Learn more![⟨3⟩![](https://www.dojah.io)](https://www.dojah.io/</partners>)

# Certifications
Dojah is fully compliant with data protection regulations, including NDPR, SOC, etc. ensuring that all user data is handled securely and ethically. Our certifications underscore our commitment to maintaining the highest standards of data privacy. Partner with confidence, knowing your data is in safe hands

generated_description:
Dojah Inc. is making a big splash in the fintech space with its commitment to preventing fraud and accelerating user onboarding. Founded in 2021 and part of the Y Combinator Batch W22, this San Francisco-based company has quickly carved out a niche as an AI-powered end-to-end fraud prevention and KYC platform. 

With a lean team of just 22 employees, Dojah is tackling some heavy challenges in the realm of financial crime. Their mission? To help businesses onboard customers faster while keeping fraud at bay. 

### What They Offer:

At its core, Dojah’s platform encompasses two primary hubs: 
1. **Anti-Fraud Hub**: This aspect focuses on real-time fraud prevention, employing a combination of rule-based and event-based approaches. Be it AML compliance or transaction monitoring, they have tailored solutions that manage risk effectively.
  
2. **Identity Hub**: A comprehensive identity verification solution that goes beyond traditional KYC (Know Your Customer) tools. Dojah offers customizable verification flows that can adapt to specific business needs, enhancing user experience and compliance readiness.

### Why It Matters:

In a digital age where security and trust are paramount, Dojah's tools help companies build a robust framework for growth. Businesses can streamline customer due diligence and quickly identify any suspicious behaviors, reducing the chances of financial loss significantly. 

### Customer Success:

Dojah's technology is already being lauded by its users, including testimonies of up to a 99% reduction in user verification time and an unwavering reliable service with no downtime recorded.

As they push forward, Dojah remains committed to maintaining high standards of data privacy and compliance, ensuring businesses can confidently integrate their solutions. If you’re looking to bolster your defenses against fraud while enhancing customer onboarding, Dojah could be the partner you need.

For more details and to see what they can do for your business, visit their [website](https://www.dojah.io).
